class blog.models.Post(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This model defines a blog post. :param title: The title of the post. :type title: str

Parameters:

  • body (str) – The content of the post.

  • signature (str) – The author of the post.

  • date (datetime) – The date the post was created.

Returns:

The title of the post.

Return type:

str
